typography.fontFamily: System (SF Pro / Roboto — monospace for glyph rendering)

navigation.structure: Single-screen app with bottom action bar. Home is the primary (and only tab-like) view. Mini-games, achievements, and settings are stack-pushed overlays. No tab bar — the pet is always the focus.

screens.name: Home
screens.purpose: Primary screen — pet display, stats, and interaction buttons. This is where 90% of time is spent.
screens.layout: Vertical stack: top status row (life stage + day/night) → center pet glyph (large, breathing animation) → stats row (4 horizontal bars) → bottom action bar (feed/play/clean/rest)

screens.name: MiniGames
screens.purpose: Game selection hub — choose from 3 mini-games that boost happiness
screens.layout: Vertical list of 3 game cards with glyph icon, name, and high score. Minimal — no images, just typography.

screens.name: GlyphMatch
screens.purpose: Memory matching game — flip glyph cards to find pairs
screens.layout: 4x4 grid of face-down glyph cards. Tap to reveal. Match pairs. Monochrome cards with border reveal animation.

screens.name: RhythmTap
screens.purpose: Rhythm game — tap glyphs as they scroll in from the right
screens.layout: Full-screen with a tap zone on the left. Glyphs drift right-to-left. Tap when glyph enters the zone. Minimal — just dots and lines.

screens.name: MemoryGrid
screens.purpose: Pattern memory game — watch a sequence of glyphs light up, then repeat
screens.layout: 3x3 grid. Cells flash in sequence. Player repeats. Each round adds one step. Clean grid with border-based highlights.

screens.name: Achievements
screens.purpose: Badge collection — view unlocked and locked achievements
screens.layout: Scrollable list of achievements. Unlocked ones show glyph icon + title + date. Locked ones show muted placeholder + requirement text.

screens.name: Graveyard
screens.purpose: Memorial for past pets — view history and stats of pets that have passed
screens.layout: Vertical list of past pet cards. Each shows pet glyph (final form), name, lifespan, and peak stats. Empty state: 'No memories yet.'

screens.name: Settings
screens.purpose: App settings — notifications, haptics, theme variant, about
screens.layout: Grouped settings list. Sections: Notifications, Haptics, Theme, About. Each row is label + control. Nothing-style minimal rows.

components.name: PetGlyph
components.description: Central pet display. Renders a monospace glyph character(s) that change based on life stage and mood. Uses Animated.View for breathing/bounce. Size: 72-96px.

components.name: StatsRow
components.description: Horizontal row of 4 stat bars. Each is a label (uppercase, 11px) + thin horizontal progress bar (2px height, white fill on dark background). Shows value decay in real-time.

components.name: ActionBar
components.description: Bottom-fixed row of 4 action buttons. Each is a glyph icon + label. Tap triggers stat boost + pet animation + haptic. Cooldown state dims the button.

components.name: DayNightIndicator
components.description: Small indicator showing current time-of-day state (dawn/day/dusk/night). Single glyph character: ○ ● ◐ ◑. Affects background subtle tint.

components.name: LifeStageLabel
components.description: Top-left label showing current life stage name + days alive. Uppercase, muted text. e.g., 'EGG · DAY 1'

components.name: StatusBar
components.description: Top status row spanning full width. Pet name left-aligned, life stage center, day/night right-aligned. All in label-small typography.

components.name: GameCard
components.description: Pressable card for mini-game selection. Border-only card with glyph icon, game name, and best score. 1px border, no fill.

components.name: GlyphCard
components.description: Flippable card for GlyphMatch game. Shows back (border-only square) or front (glyph character). Matched cards stay revealed with dimmed border.

components.name: AchievementRow
components.description: Single achievement row. Unlocked: white text + glyph icon + date. Locked: muted text + '???' icon + requirement description.

components.name: ToggleSwitch
components.description: Minimal toggle. Off: ○ (outline circle). On: ● (filled circle). Label to the left. No color — pure monochrome state.

components.name: SettingsRow
components.description: Settings list item. Label left, value/control right. 1px bottom border. Pressable for navigation rows, inline control for toggles.

components.name: ThemePicker
components.description: Horizontal scroll of theme variant previews. Each shows a sample glyph in that theme's style. Locked themes show a lock glyph.

components.name: BackButton
components.description: Top-left back arrow. Single glyph: ← . Pressable with haptic feedback.

components.name: EmptyState
components.description: Centered muted text for empty lists. e.g., 'No memories yet.' Single line, textMuted color.

designPrinciples: Nothing aesthetic: pure black background, white typography, 1px borders, no color
Typography-first: glyphs and text are the primary visual elements, not illustrations
Breathing room: generous spacing, no visual clutter, every element earns its place
Instant comprehension: David (41) should understand every screen in 5 seconds
Ambient, not anxious: no guilt mechanics, no countdown timers visible to user, no punishment for absence
Haptic language: subtle vibrations replace visual feedback for interactions

budgetConstraints.allowedComponents: Basic views, text, pressables, animated views, AsyncStorage
budgetConstraints.disallowed: No charts, no maps, no camera, no cloud sync, no third-party UI libraries
budgetConstraints.animations: React Native Animated API only (no Lottie, no Rive)
